content.title: The Staffing Dilemma: Traditional Agency or Digital Platform?
paragraphs: Swiss pharmacies needing temporary staff have traditionally turned to placement agencies to fill their human resource needs. These intermediaries have long been the default solution, despite their well-known limitations in terms of cost, responsiveness, and transparency.

The emergence of digital platforms like InteriMed® represents an innovative alternative that is disrupting this established model. This evolution is part of a broader trend of digital transformation in the healthcare sector, where efficiency and resource optimization are becoming strategic priorities.
Faced with this choice, pharmacies must objectively evaluate the advantages and disadvantages of each approach to determine the solution that best meets their specific temporary staffing needs.

content.title: Detailed Comparison - Costs, Speed, Transparency, Control: The Decisive Criteria
paragraphs: To help pharmacies make an informed choice, here is a point-by-point comparison between traditional placement agencies and InteriMed®:
**Costs:**

• Traditional agencies: High commission fees, often between 20% and 40% of the annual salary for permanent recruitment. For temporary staff, a multiplier of around 1.40 is applied to the hourly rate, representing a significant margin.
• InteriMed®: Transparent pricing model based on reduced service fees, allowing overall savings of 30 to 50% compared to traditional agencies.
**Speed and Efficiency:**
• Traditional agencies: Often slow processes involving multiple intermediaries, with average delays of 2 to 4 weeks to find a suitable candidate.
• InteriMed®: Direct and immediate access to a database of available professionals, allowing a need to be filled in a few hours or a few days depending on urgency.
**Transparency:**
• Traditional agencies: Often opaque pricing, limited choice of candidates presented, little visibility into the selection process.
• InteriMed®: Complete and verified profiles, real-time visibility of availability and rates, direct communication with professionals.
**Control and Flexibility:**
• Traditional agencies: Little control over the selection process, dependence on the agency for communication with candidates.
• InteriMed®: Total autonomy to browse and select candidates who best match the specific needs and culture of the pharmacy.
This disintermediation of the staffing process offers pharmacies more direct control, greater transparency, and potentially better financial results by eliminating the intermediary's margin.

content.title: InteriMed®: The Advantages of a Modern Solution for a Demanding Market
paragraphs: Beyond a simple comparison with traditional agencies, InteriMed® offers unique value propositions that address the specific challenges of the Swiss pharmaceutical sector:
• **Cost-effectiveness**: In a context of pressure on pharmacy margins, reducing staffing costs represents a significant financial optimization lever.
• **Speed**: Faced with the unpredictability of staffing needs (sick leave, seasonal activity peaks), the ability to quickly find qualified replacements is crucial for maintaining service continuity.
• **Transparency**: Full visibility of profiles, availability, and costs allows for better human resource planning and management.
• **Wider choice**: Access to a diverse pool of professionals increases the chances of finding the ideal person for each specific need.
• **Ease of use**: The platform's intuitive interface reduces the learning curve and allows for rapid adoption by teams.
• **Alignment with digital transformation**: By adopting a digital solution for staffing, pharmacies are part of the overall modernization of the healthcare sector.
The quality of professionals available on InteriMed® is guaranteed by a rigorous process of verifying qualifications and references, ensuring pharmacies access to reliable and competent talent.

content.title: Make the Informed Choice for Your Pharmacy's Needs
paragraphs: The choice between a traditional placement agency and a digital platform like InteriMed® ultimately depends on your pharmacy's specific priorities:
• If cost reduction and budget optimization are your priorities, InteriMed® offers a significant financial advantage.
• If speed of intervention and flexibility are essential for your establishment, the digital solution will allow you to react more effectively to urgent needs.
• If you value transparency and direct control over your staffing process, the platform gives you the tools to actively manage your temporary human resources.
• If you are looking to modernize your management practices and align with innovation trends in the healthcare sector, adopting a digital solution represents a strategic step in this direction.

InteriMed® was designed specifically to meet the unique challenges of Swiss pharmacies in terms of temporary staff. By combining cutting-edge technology and a deep understanding of the pharmaceutical sector, the platform offers a tailor-made solution that transforms how pharmacies manage their staffing needs.
We invite you to explore InteriMed® and discover for yourself how this innovative solution can meet your specific temporary staffing needs.
